msg.neutron.cmd.back.invalid: No previous location before teleportation stored...
msg.neutron.cmd.back.invalidNumber: Please check the ordinal number you entered, it may not be in the right format, or the value may not be reasonable
msg.neutron.cmd.back.success: You were teleported back to previous location {0}.
msg.neutron.cmd.back.vague: You have {0} former locations stored: {1}. Please define the ordinal number of the location you want to teleport back to.
msg.neutron.cmd.home.vague: You have {0} homes: {1}. Please define the name of the home you want to take action on.
msg.neutron.cmd.home.invalid: You have not set your home yet....
msg.neutron.cmd.home.set.failure: Failed to set home "{0}", please check if a home with the same name is existed.
msg.neutron.cmd.rtp.ranOut: RTP chances ran out. You will get one after {0} tick(s).
msg.neutron.cmd.rtp.success: RTP succeeded and teleported you to {0}! You still have {1} RTP chances now.
msg.neutron.cmd.rtp.triesExceeded: Still failed to get RTP target location after {0} tries. Please consider trying again. Your RTP chances are not consumed this time.
msg.neutron.cmd.tp.cantTpYourSelf: The teleportation target can't be yourself!
msg.neutron.cmd.tp.requestSent: Request sent successfully. Expiration Time: {0} tick(s).
msg.neutron.cmd.reload.error: Error occurred when reloading neutron configurations.
msg.neutron.init.onClient: Attention: The mod was designed for servers. It will really work on the client only when you host a LAN world!
